channel.title: Theme Customization on Xianmin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Theme Customization on Xianmin's Blog

item.title: Hugo-Theme-Jane V3 Major Update
item.description: Hugo theme Jane releases V3 major update, introducing Pico CSS color system with dark mode support, new custom homepage functionality, and STYLE SETTINGS for personalization. This update focuses on enhancing user experience and customization needs while maintaining simplicity, allowing users to focus more on writing.
